{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-2740B |revision=F1 |asin= |manuf_country=China |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/27/2011 |fcc_id=KA2SL2740BF1 |pcb_id= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63281 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EN1-12G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P3R12E4JFF-G8E |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}
"2976380401" and "A610A234006R_R6" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device appears to use [[Broadcom]] BCM63281.
Additional models of.. *DSL-2750B (Annex A, USB, 'dying gasp' feature) *DSL-2740B (Annex A, no USB, without 'dying gasp') *DSL-2740U (Annex A, no USB, without 'dying gasp') *DSL-2741B (Annex B, USB, 'dying gasp' feature) *DSL-2741U (Annex B, USB, 'dying gasp' feature)
===See also=== *[[D-Link DSL-2750U rev C1]] :[[Broadcom]] BCM63281/BCM43225 *[[D-Link DSL-2750B rev T1]] :[[Broadcom]] BCM63281/BCM43225 *[[D-Link DSL-2750B rev B1]] (AW4339U) :[[Broadcom]] BCM63281/[[Atheros]] AR9287 *[[D-Link DSL-2740B rev F1]] :[[Broadcom]] BCM63281/[[Atheros]] AR9287
